title: i can join a rank team that is gold (just want sivir skin) ;(

replies.body: You can be in a ranked 5's team that's Gold + to get the rewards, I've seen someone with a silver border have the Victorious Morgana skin (the victorious skin for 2014), but I'm pretty sure you need to play a certain amount of games in that team to be able to be eligible anyway, like win 10 or something...
From what i understand you need to be gold+ in solo queue to get the skin not ranked 5's?
You need to do more than just be in a Gold+ team to receive rewards.
